ing: 1 (16 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
1 medium red bell pepper, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
des: "Red Pepper Hummus that has been a favorite of all my friends. Easy to make! Serve with chips, pita chips, veggies, or whatever."
ins: In a food processor or blender, mix the garbanzo beans, olive oil, red bell pepper, tahini, lime juice, water, salt, black pepper, and garlic powder. Blend until smooth.
